Sasori uses the [[Third Kazekage (puppet)|Third Kazekage]] [[human puppet]] to release a series long spike of [[Iron Sand]] surrounding him to stab the opponent.

== Trivia ==
* Though similar to the [[Iron Sand Gathering Assault|Iron Sand Spear]], this technique differs in use by creating longer, thinner spikes that resemble stalagmites.

[[es:Arena de Hierro: Cadena]]
